item.description:
Due to the sell out of our previous New Guest Weekend we are offering another for those who missed out!

The Brettl-Hupfers will be at our lodge in Bartlett, NH for a great weekend of skiing and riding. This is the First Race Weekend of the season and it is taking place at Bretton Woods so members of our club and our guests can purchase discount lift tickets for Saturday, January 9th, at Bretton Woods whether racing or not. Discount price TBD and posted later on.

Guests are welcome for only $10 per night guest fees - this is half off regular price! Once you RSVP full directions and information will follow.

Members and guests must be 21+
item.name: New Guest Weekend, January 8 - 10, 2010 - Discount Lift Tickets
